DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of povidone-iodine on infectious complication rate caused by transrectal prostate biopsy
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Trial of Povidone-iodine Suppository Before Transrectal Ultrasound Guided Prostate Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: the effect of povidone-iodine on infectious complication rate caused by transrectal prostate biopsy
DOC.criteria: who undergo transrectal prostate biopsy patients who refuse to be included, patients who have hypersensitivity to iodine, patients who have abnormal thyroid function, patients who do not visit followup, patients who have received prior radioactiveiodine therapy
